column1: Narrator : The boat arrives on a tiny island, on a beach riddled with boat carcasses, of all size and shapes. There’s an old cabin a the end of the beach

column2: OtherSpeak : I make wonders with boats !

column3: Choice : Take a look at my boat ! (trade)
column9: Choice : Lets go back to serious matters
column12: Choice : How’s the carpenter life going ? (quete)

column4: OtherSpeak : After having freatened me ? No way
column10: OtherSpeak : Go DIRECTIONTOFORMULA, you’ll hear about it, for sure
column11: OtherSpeak : Nope, never heard about it !

column6: OtherSpeak : Take this and leave the island
column12: OtherSpeak : I don’t have time to sail away anymore

column1: Narrator : The carpenter died in front of his house, and the door is wide opened

column2: PlayerSpeak : Just a stack of straw…

column4: Narrator : There’s a little straw block to sleep, and a pantry near the door
column7: Narrator : There’s a block of straw to sleep, and a barrel filled with weapons
column10: Narrator : There’s a bit of straw to sleep in, and a chest, filled with random stuff
